text: (napiyē! Avarkaḷiṭam;)"naṟ ceyalkaḷaic ceyyuṅkaḷ; tiṭaṉāka uṅkaḷ ceyalkaḷai allāhvum avaṉ tūtarum, muḥmiṉkaḷum pārttuk koṇṭutāṉiruppārkaḷ; mēlum, irakaciyaṅkaḷaiyum, parakaciṅkaḷaiyum aṟiyum iṟaivaṉiṭattil nīṅkaḷ mīṭṭappaṭuvīrkaḷ - appoḻutu, avaṉ nīṅkaḷ ceytu koṇṭiruntatai uṅkaḷukku aṟivippāṉ" eṉṟu kūṟum
